title: Math Challenge
description: Solve word problems and explain your thinking!

prompts.input: There are 12 cookies on a plate. Four friends want to share them equally. How many cookies does each friend get? Show how you figured it out.
hints: Think about dividing the cookies into equal groups

prompts.input: A farmer has 15 chickens and 8 cows. How many legs are there in total? Explain your thinking step by step.
hints: How many legs does a chicken have?
How many legs does a cow have?
Find each total, then add them together
